description: Construction of a detached two storey two-bedroom house (following demolition of existing garage), formation of a vehicle crossover (fronting Denbigh Road), with associated parking and landscaping
decision_conditions: The proposed house by reason of its size, siting and design is out of character in terms of its appearance compared with existing development in the vicinity, resulting in an unacceptable impact on the visual character of the locality, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework, policies 3.5, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2011 and policies 4.1, 4.8 and 5.5 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) ; policies 3.5, 7.4, and 7B of the Draft Ealing Development Management Plan Document, policies 4.1 and 5.5 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004), and Housing Supplementary Guidance (November 2012).
